metadata.synopsis: Second Combat AD for Kerri's spirit during combat with the player. She wants to claim Oskar's spirit and take him back to the ethereal plane as punishment for bringing her back
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Go to CTY_Main_A -248; 30; -462) oe LOW_OskarsBeloved_CombatReadyKerriSpirit3) Second turn in combat with Kerri

0.speaker: Kerri Evenfield
0.text: I can't live without you, Oskar. Is that what you want to hear?
0.context: NodeContext: Mocking, mid-combat line. Aggressive sarcasm
